title: TOWIE SPOILER: Yazmin Oukhellou reveals ex James Lock is moving on with one of her FRIENDS
text:
James 'Lockie' Lock was pictured locking lips with blonde bombshell Ellie McKenzie as the duo put on a passionate display during a recent night out in Essex.

However his ex Yazmin Oukhellou has been left less than impressed by his recent antics, due to the fact she is apparently friends with the girl he was seen snogging.

During an upcoming episode of TOWIE, Yazmin is set to reveal to a group of her gal pals that she was left upset after seeing snaps of James with his new love interest.

Raging: Yazmin Oukhellou has been left less than impressed after discovering her ex boyfriend James Lock kissed one of her friends

Broaching the topic of James' snog, Courtney Green asks: 'Yaz have you seen those pictures of Locky and that girl online?'

While Chloe Meadows chimes in: 'I wasn't going to say it to you, was going to wait until you brought it up.'

Yaz candidly admits: 'I did get a little bit upset, not because James is moving on with someone, but this girl was messaging me last week asking me to go for dinner and asking for my boob surgeon.

Happier times: Yaz and Lockie were together for three years before they split this summer following allegations of infidelity (pictured January 2019)

Ouch: During an upcoming episode of TOWIE, Yazmin is set to reveal to a group of her gal pals that she was left upset after seeing snaps of James with his new love interest

Apparently confused over the girls' intentions, she adds: 'What does she want new boobs for James to look at that look exactly like mine? I don't know what this girl's issue is.'

Attempting to make sense of the situation, Chloe says: 'So you know her?'

Yaz replies: 'I know her! I messaged the girl, I maybe said some things I shouldn't have said. But we all know what I'm like. She tried to lie and say it was like a drunken kiss thing that they just met out as a group.'

The brunette beauty goes on to insist that she is fine with James moving on without her, and even adds that the girl is welcome to her plastic surgeon as well.

New girl: James Lock was pictured locking lips with blonde bombshell Ellie McKenzie (pictured) as the duo put on a passionate display during a recent night out in Essex

Question time: Broaching the topic of James' snog, Courtney Green asks: 'Yaz have you seen those pictures of Locky and that girl online?'

Yaz candidly admits: ' I did get a little bit upset, not because James is moving on with someone, but this girl was messaging me last week asking me to go for dinner and asking for my boob surgeon'

Elsewhere, James recently slammed claims he’s dating Ellie – and says even his mum disapproved of their passionate kiss.

The TOWIE star insisted he 'won’t be pursuing Ellie' and 'it was never going to be anything serious' as he jokingly confesses to 'taking anyone with a pulse.'

In an exclusive interview with MailOnline, James confessed that, 'like many footballers he only attracts a certain type of woman', before quipping he often finds himself lumbered with 'bad b****es!'

Confused: Apparently confused over the girls' intentions, she adds: 'What does she want new boobs for James to look at that look exactly like mine? I don't know what this girls issue is'

Baffled: Attempting to make sense of the situation, Chloe says: 'So you know her?'

James, who was pictured kissing Ellie outside Hakkasan restaurant in London, believes he was 'setup' and says he had no intention of going public with the brief fling.

He said: 'Someone set up the photos. Even though I’m on a reality show I’m quite a private person.

'There was a group of us in Hakkasan and I met the girl for a few drinks and it was blown out of proportion.

'It was a nothing thing, it was never going to be anything serious. She’s not someone I was seeing, she’s not my girlfriend, everyone was saying “James’ new girlfriend,” she’s not my new girlfriend. It was something casual.

'There won’t be a second date, I won’t be pursuing her. She’s not a bit of me. I’ve been getting it in the ear from my mum saying she’s not for me!'
description: James Lock was pictured locking lips with blonde bombshell Ellie McKenzie as the duo put on a passionate display during a recent night out in Essex.
